name: Bubble Pop - Shoot Bubbles
description:
Bubble Pop - Shoot Bubbles is the best puzzle game in the app store!
Shoot and blast all the colored balls and beat all the fun challenges in this classic and addicting bubble pop game! It’s the ultimate bubble craze!
If online puzzle games tickle your fancy, get ready to experience hours of bubble popping, blasting and crushing fun! Revisit the classic games that are simple and easy to learn.
Get this action-packed game today, tap on the screen to shoot balls, make bubble combinations and plan your moves to finish levels.
Play this brain-teasing game and enjoy thousands of challenging puzzle levels, cool boosters, and awesome in-game features.
Bubble Pop - Shoot Bubbles is an addictive bubble shooting game suitable for both kids and adults to play and have a blast. Pop all the bubbles by matching three colors. Fans of classic arcade games will definitely enjoy this addictive bubble shooter adventure. Aim carefully to hit the target and drop all the colorful balloons!
Work your way through all the different challenges and puzzles, solve the brain teasers and win levels. You can start any level over and not have to wait for lives, as they are unlimited!
IN BUBBLE POP - SHOOT BUBBLES YOU’LL GET TO:
Challenge yourself with thousands of puzzle levels.
 Make combinations of 3 or more identically colored bubbles to pop the group
Practice your planning and strategy skills.
 Unlock powerful boosts and power-ups and use them to explode bubbles.
Boost your skills, hit and smash the balloons and clear the board.
 Overcome different challenges and win big.
* Play anytime and anywhere you want, no wifi needed!
Do you miss the classic arcade games?
Get a chance to relieve some of your childhood memories with this brand-new ball popping puzzle game. Visit the bubble shooting arcade and experience hours of bubble popping, breaking and smashing fun!
Step into a world of sheer amusement and enjoy fun shooting games. Use awesome boosters that will help you solve challenges and break bubbles. Exercise your brain and practice your strategy skills. Enjoy this puzzle game with your family and compete for the top scores, there is no time limit so you can play at your own pace.
FUN FEATURES
- Thousands of fun puzzle levels.
- Cool boosts and power-ups.
- Action-packed gameplay
- Plenty of amazing brain teasers.
- Fun game for kids and adults to play and enjoy.
- Simple and fun blast game.
ADDICTIVE GAMES
Bubble Pop - Shoot Bubbles is a relaxing, fun bubble shooter game that will keep you engaged for hours. Heads Up: the longer you play, the more addicted you’ll get!
Looking for fun games for adults and kids to play? Can’t get enough of online balloon pop games? Download this awesome app and take your gaming experience to the next level!
HOW TO PLAY
- Drag your finger to move the laser sight.
- Aim at your target.
- Lift your finger to shoot bubbles.
- Hit and break all the colored balls.
- Match 3 colors, clear the board and win the game.
- Complete the missions and reach the level target.
- Form a strategy according to the different bubbles layout in each level.
Break and blast the colorful balls in this fun puzzle game. Make sure to aim well so your bubble will land exactly where you want it. See which bubble color you are getting next so you can work out a strategy to pop your way to victory and rule the shooter games!
Liked the game? We would love to get your feedback! Let us know what we can add to make your gameplay even more enjoyable and earn your 5-star review.
Bubble Pop - Shoot Bubbles is free to play, but some optional in-game items will require payment.
